[[File:Photograph of a toe infection.jpg|left|thumb|Photograph of a toe infection]]

question.title: What is the most common cause of toe infections in children and adults?

option_a.title: Poor hygiene
option_a.description: Not washing hands regularly, especially after using the bathroom or before eating

option_b.title: Trauma to the toe
option_b.description: Injury to the toe, such as a cut or broken bone

option_c.title: Fungal infection
option_c.description: Infection caused by a fungus, such as athlete's foot

option_d.title: Bacterial infection
option_d.description: Infection caused by bacteria, such as strep throat
